title: Illubru
description: Illubru is a city in the western part of Que (kingdom) or in Hilakku that is mentioned in inscriptions of the Assyrian king Sennacherib (r. 704-681 BC). This site is generally connected with classical Lampron, which is likely to be identified with modern Namrun, ca. 20 km northwest of Tarsus.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap node of Namrun Kalesi
properties.title: OSM location of Namrun Kalesi
